item.heading: Create OTM
item.description: One-time mandate (OTM) will help you setup automatic payment instructions from your bank account for your investments.

item.heading: otm_info
item.description: Though you can start doing lumpsum investments without this; a signed form is needed to activate the automatic payment instruction (referred as Mandate) for recurring SIP instalments. The form can be downloaded as you fill the mandate details. The amount in the one-time mandate cannot be modified. But you can always create a new mandate for a different amount.
